name: PATIENT_NOTICE
description: The PATIENT_NOTICE table contains information on inpatient security alerts.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient with this notice.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the notice for the patient.

columns.name: NOTICE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the notice type for the patient.

columns.name: NOTICE_COMMENT
columns.description: Free text comment concerning this notice.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the employee who entered this notice.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UPDATE_TIME
columns.description: The date when this notice was last updated.
